synopsis.text: Along side countless players in the online multiplayer game, Glory, Ye Xiu stands out as a legendary figure and an unrivaled pro-player. But when an unexpected turn of events forces him out of his professional team, he retreats to the sidelines, managing an Internet Cafe instead. However, with the launch of Glory's tenth server, Ye Xiu seizes the opportunity to reclaim his lost glory. Armed with a decade of experience, cherished memories, and an unfinished, self-crafted weapon, he embarks on a thrilling journey back to the pinnacle of the game. As he battles and outsmarts opponents, the question lingers: who stole my glory? Amidst the storm, his dreams remain unshattered, and the magnificent path to redemption lies ahead. Under the watchful eyes of millions, Ye Xiu is ready to make his triumphant return!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
